titleStmt.title: Several papers given forth for the spreading of truth and detection of deceit wherein the plain, honest, and sober conversation of the saints in fear and trembling is justified against the idle bablings of formal professors, the wicked fashons and heathenish customs of these nations, under the pretence of civillity / by G.F.
titleStmt.author: Fox, George, 1624-1691.
